marks.question: Question 1: What is technical analysis?
marks.answer: Technical analysis is the study of price movements using charts and indicators to predict future price direction.

feedback.feedback: Basic understanding demonstrated but missing important details. Elaborate with examples and connections.

overallFeedback: Good performance! You demonstrated solid understanding of the core concepts and answered 1 questions.
